casebody.data:
David PEARSON and Elizabeth Pearson, Appellants,
v.
PARADISE BY the SEA PROPERTY OWNERS ASSOCIATION, INC., Julie K. Hilton, The Loyd Charles Hilton Jr. Qualified Trust, The Lela Griffin Hilton Qualified Personal Residence Trust, and The Loyd Charles (CHIP) Hilton, III Irrevocable Trust, Appellees. No. 1D16-3979 District Court of Appeal of Florida, First District. January 26, 2018

DECISION WITHOUT PUBLISHED OPINION

Affirmed.
